div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 287 Oreus (anc. Histiaea), Euboea, before 1950 Burial: c. 127 B.C. (T); c. 97 (Lewis) Contents: AR ("hundreds") Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Athens 14; private coll. 4 Varoucha, BCH 1950, p. 292; 1955, p. 210 â€ Thompson, Athens, pp. 517-8 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 283
